entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 4:20 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Drizzle or showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
